entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of snow. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then 40 percent chance of snow overnight. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 18 April 2023
